org.echo.mobile.framework.facade.internal

Class ContractsFacadeImpl

  • BaseTransactionsFacade
    • org.echo.mobile.framework.facade.internal.ContractsFacadeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContractsFacade

    public class ContractsFacadeImpl
extends BaseTransactionsFacade
implements ContractsFacade

    Implementation of interface ContractsFacade

    Delegates API call logic to interface DatabaseApiService and interface NetworkBroadcastApiService

    See Also:
    interface ContractsFacade, interface DatabaseApiService, interface NetworkBroadcastApiService

    • Method Detail

      • createContract

        public void createContract(java.lang.String registrarNameOrId,
                           java.lang.String wif,
                           java.lang.String value,
                           java.lang.String assetId,
                           java.lang.String feeAsset,
                           java.lang.String byteCode,
                           java.util.List<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.contract.input.InputValue> params,
                           Callback<java.lang.Boolean> broadcastCallback,
                           Callback<java.lang.String> resultCallback)

        Creates contract on blockchain

        Parameters:
        registrarNameOrId - Name or id of account that creates the contract
        wif - Account's private key in wif format
        value - Payable value for contract creation
        assetId - Asset of contract
        feeAsset - Asset for fee pay
        byteCode - Bytecode of the created contract
        params - Params for contract constructor
        broadcastCallback - Callback for result of operation broadcast
        resultCallback - Callback for retrieving result of operation (not required). Retrieves result of transactions if exists - history id which contains call contract result, if not exists - empty string

      • callContract

        public void callContract(java.lang.String userNameOrId,
                         java.lang.String wif,
                         java.lang.String assetId,
                         java.lang.String feeAsset,
                         java.lang.String contractId,
                         java.lang.String methodName,
                         java.util.List<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.contract.input.InputValue> methodParams,
                         java.lang.String value,
                         Callback<java.lang.Boolean> broadcastCallback,
                         Callback<java.lang.String> resultCallback)

        Calls to contract on blockchain using account private key wif

        Parameters:
        userNameOrId - Name or id of account that calls the contract
        wif - Account's private key in wif format
        assetId - Asset of contract
        feeAsset - Asset for fee pay
        contractId - Id of called contract
        methodName - Name of called method
        methodParams - Parameters of calling method
        value - Amount for payable methods
        broadcastCallback - Callback for result of operation deploying
        resultCallback - Callback for retrieving result of operation (not required). Retrieves result of transactions if exists - history id which contains call contract result, if not exists - empty string

      • callContract

        public void callContract(java.lang.String userNameOrId,
                         java.lang.String wif,
                         java.lang.String assetId,
                         java.lang.String feeAsset,
                         java.lang.String contractId,
                         java.lang.String code,
                         java.lang.String value,
                         Callback<java.lang.Boolean> broadcastCallback,
                         Callback<java.lang.String> resultCallback)

        Calls to contract on blockchain using account private key wif

        Required valid code for contract call

        Parameters:
        userNameOrId - Name or id of account that calls the contract
        wif - Account's private key in wif format
        assetId - Asset of contract
        feeAsset - Asset for fee pay
        contractId - Id of called contract
        code - Valid code for contract call
        value - Amount for payable methods
        broadcastCallback - Callback for result of operation deploying
        resultCallback - Callback for retrieving result of operation (not required). Retrieves result of transactions if exists - history id which contains call contract result, if not exists - empty string

      • queryContract

        public void queryContract(java.lang.String userNameOrId,
                          java.lang.String assetId,
                          java.lang.String contractId,
                          java.lang.String methodName,
                          java.util.List<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.contract.input.InputValue> methodParams,
                          Callback<java.lang.String> callback)

        Calls contract method without changing state of blockchain

        Parameters:
        userNameOrId - Name or id of account that calls the contract
        contractId - Id of called contract
        assetId - Asset of contract
        methodName - Name of calling method
        methodParams - Parameters of called method
        callback - Listener of operation results.

      • queryContract

        public void queryContract(java.lang.String userNameOrId,
                          java.lang.String assetId,
                          java.lang.String contractId,
                          java.lang.String code,
                          Callback<java.lang.String> callback)

        Calls contract method without changing state of blockchain

        Parameters:
        userNameOrId - Name or id of account that calls the contract
        contractId - Id of called contract
        assetId - Asset of contract
        code - Valid code for contract query
        callback - Listener of operation results.

        Return result of contract operation call

        Parameters:
        historyId - History operation id

      • getContractLogs

        public void getContractLogs(java.lang.String contractId,
                            java.lang.String fromBlock,
                            java.lang.String toBlock,
                            Callback<java.util.List> callback)

        Return list of contract logs

        Parameters:
        contractId - Contract id for fetching logs
        fromBlock - Number of the earliest block to retrieve
        toBlock - Number of the most recent block to retrieve
        callback - Listener of operation results.
